name: Goosfish!?!
description:
***This is an audio based game, please make sure you have a head set or sterio device!!!***

Controls: ActionKeyLookMouseMoveWASDSprintLeft ShiftRepairLeft Mouse ButtonRestartBackspace Description:

You are trapped in a dark chamber where auqnaut shaped monsters await, like goosfish baiting for there prey. The only way out is to repair three generators scattered in the room to spawn a exit.

Luckily, the monsters cannot hear you, use this at your advantage. But beware! The spotlights may detct you if you run.

Oh, just to mention one more thing.

Video Trailer: 

FEAR THE LIGHT!!! For the Goosefish see you by your shadow!! GameGuide: Generator
There are three of these in the room, locate them by their noise and use the front panel to repair it. SafeHut
If you are being haunted by spotlights, go hide under one of these. The glimmer blue when you are in need. Exit
Will Appear after all three gerators are repaired, hop in to escape this madness. Goosefish Aquanaut
They can't hear you, but the can see your shadow. Avoid stepping into strong lights and get pass them by there breathing sound. You can outrun them when they first saw you, but their speed grows through time.
Spotlight
Danger! Stay away from it at all caust, find safehut if you were spotted or they will haunt you to the end of the world! Game under development
VR version in progress
